metadata.title: CVE-2021-41991 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The in-memory certificate cache in strongSwan before 5.9.4 has a remoteinteger overflow upon receiving many requests with different certificatesto fill the cache and later trigger the replacement of cache entries. Thecode attempts to select a less-often-used cache entry by means of a randomnumber generator, but this is not done correctly. Remote code executionmight be a slight possibility.

criterions.comment: strongswan package in fips/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
